io.openems.edge.common.component

Class AbstractOpenemsComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.openems.edge.common.component.AbstractOpenemsComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OpenemsComponent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractModbusBridge, AbstractOpenemsModbusComponent, AbstractScheduler, AsymmetricFixActivePower, AsymmetricFixReactivePower, BackendApi, Balancing, BatteryDummy, ChannelThreshold, CosPhi, CSVDatasource, DebugDetailedLog, DebugLog, DischargeLimitConsideringCellVoltage, EssAsymmetric, EssCluster, EssSymmetric, FixDigitalOutput, GridMeter, GridMeter, InfluxTimedata, KebaKeContact, KostalPikoCharger, KostalPikoCoreImpl, KostalPikoEss, KostalPikoGridMeter, LimitTotalDischargeController, MetaImpl, ModbusTcpApi, NRCMeter, PeakShaving, PhaseRectification, PowerComponent, ProductionMeter, RestApi, Sum, SymmetricFixActivePower, SymmetricFixReactivePower, SymmetricLimitActivePower, SymmetricLinearPowerBand, SymmetricRandomPower, WebsocketApi

    public abstract class AbstractOpenemsComponent
extends java.lang.Object
implements OpenemsComponent
    This is the default implementation of the OpenemsComponent interface. activate(ComponentContext, String, String, boolean) and deactivate() methods should be called by the corresponding methods in the OSGi component.

        Description copied from interface: OpenemsComponent
